thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Kristin

author: Kristin
title: Kristin
text: I didn't know it was possible to be so obsessed with labels, but Mabel's Labels are truly the best. They look adorable, but the best part is how well they stay to everything! Clothing, shoes, school supplies, snack cups...I have never had one budge or start to come off. Equally incredible is how they are removable when you don't need them anymore without leaving a mark or residue.
